mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pwd, name, email, phone, auth, filename, newfilename) values(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, 3, "image.jpg", "image.jpg")
mapper.update: update member set mail_key=#{mail_key} where email=#{email} and id=#{id}
update member set mail_auth=1 where email=#{email} and mail_key=#{mail_key}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id=#{id} and mail_auth=1
